definition: To modify or enhance the appearance of something, typically related to fashion, design, or aesthetics. It involves applying creative techniques or arranging elements in a visually appealing manner. This term is commonly used in the context of personal style, fashion trends, or artistic expression.

examples.german: Ich style meine Haare jeden Morgen.
examples.english: I style my hair every morning.

examples.german: Er stylt sich immer sehr modisch.
examples.english: He always styles himself very fashionably.

examples.german: Die Band hat ihren eigenen Musikstil entwickelt.
examples.english: The band has developed their own style of music.

examples.german: Kannst du mir beim Stylen dieses Outfits helfen?
examples.english: Can you help me style this outfit?
